short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture screen of MA Scenarios in iPresso Marketing Automation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to download iPresso's Marketing Automation scenarios as images.

Step by step:
1. Log into iPresso.
2. Move to one of your Marketing Automation scenarios (choose View or Edit).
3. The icon of the extension will change its colour. Click on it (it's the image of a camera, to the right of the address bar).
4. After a moment, your browser will start downloading the file. That's all!
